Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules.applicable

Interface ApplicableRules<T extends GameOperationState,​S extends Rules<T,​S>>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the GameOperationState required for the rules application
S - The type of the Rules that can be merged with this ApplicableRules
All Superinterfaces:
RulesConvertible<T,​S>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicableBRules, ApplicableMRules
All Known Implementing Classes:
BRules, MRules, Rules
public interface ApplicableRules<T extends GameOperationState,​S extends Rules<T,​S>>
extends RulesConvertible<T,​S>
Brief Interface for the practical application of a certain type of Rules
See Also:
Rules
